Package org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord

Open Grid Forum GFD.98 Usage Record Format

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JobUsageRecord
    Open Grid Forum GFD.98 Usage Record

Package org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord Description

Open Grid Forum GFD.98 Usage Record Format

JAXB bean for the Usage Record Format 1.0 as described by Open Grid Forum (OGF) specification GFD-R-P.098.

The main class JobUsageRecord represents the outer <UsageRecord> element with convenience methods for setting its properties.

The underlying JAXB elements and types are covered by the packages org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.urf representing the namespace http://schema.ogf.org/urf/2003/09/urf and org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.dsig representing the namespace http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#.

The package org.apache.taverna.server.usagerecord.xml.urf2 provides experimental bindings for the Usage Record Format 2.0 in namespace http://schema.ogf.org/urf/2013/04/urf as specified by the superseding OGF specification GFD-R-P.204.

See Also:
Open Grid Forum specification GFD.98, Open Grid Forum specification GFD.204, W3C Recommendation XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.1
